TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class SelectResult : SemWeb.StatementSource, System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.param: The sink to receive the statements.
Docs.summary: Streams the result of this Select call to a StatementSink.
Docs.remarks: If the statements have not yet been loaded into memory, this call will stream the result of the Select call to the sink without loading all of the statements into memory at once.

Docs.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates over the statements.
Docs.returns: An enumerator that iterates over the matching statements.
Docs.remarks: This method is implemented to allow SelectResult objects to be used in loops. Upon calling this method, all of the matching statements are loaded into memory as if through a call to .

Docs.summary: Loads all of the matching statements into memory and returns a MemoryStore containing the statements.
Docs.returns: A MemoryStore containing the matching statements.
Docs.remarks: Calling this method is not advised when the number of matching statements may be very large.

Docs.summary: Gets the number of matching statements.
Docs.remarks: Upon accessing this property, all of the matching statements are loaded into memory as if through a call to .

Docs.summary: Loads all of the matching statements into memory and returns them as an array.
Docs.remarks: Calling this method is not advised when the number of matching statements may be very large.

Docs.summary: This class is used to hold the results of a call to Select.
